page_content: The page focuses on research projects supported by the Department of Education, Culture, and Sport in the Canton of Aargau.
The page discusses the successful implementation of the Cultural Concept 2017â€“2022 in the Canton of Aargau and future plans for cultural promotion.
The page reports on increased customer satisfaction in public transportation in the Canton of Aargau based on a survey.
The page discusses the opening of a new bike path in Untersiggenthal, part of the cantonal bike routes plan.
The page provides information on various measures to help young people enter the workforce, including apprenticeship search support and motivational semesters.
The page provides guidelines and forms related to road signage and markings, including fees for signage requests and various types of wayfinders.
The page discusses the challenges and strategies for libraries in the digital age, including workshops and an award ceremony for innovative projects.

The page offers a toolbox for municipalities and planners, providing various types of information and guidelines for internal development, including climate, housing for the elderly, and community-friendly designs.
The page outlines strategies and guidelines for the development of pedestrian and bicycle traffic in the Canton of Aargau, including safety measures and infrastructure planning.
The page provides updates on AGOBIS, a software for the Canton of Aargau's land registry, including maintenance schedules and user guides.
